boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Blood Bowl: Team Manager - The Card Game is a bone-breaking, breathtaking standalone card game of violence and outright cheating for two to four players. Chaos, Dwarf, Wood Elf, Human, Orc, and Skaven teams compete against each other over the course of a brutal season. Customize your team by drafting Star Players, hiring staff, upgrading facilities, and cheating like mad. Lead your gang of misfits and miscreants to glory over your rivals all to become Spike! Magazine's Manager of the Year!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once a manager has chosen one of the six teams, he has five weeks to groom them into the best in the league, culminating with the Blood Bowl tournament. He does this by competing at highlights, collecting payouts, upgrading his personnel, and drafting Star Players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Managers begin the season with a starting team deck full of basic scrub players. These players are none too bright and have limited talents, but a clever manager can play to their strengths by carefully positioning them to excel on the pitch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Is your team ready to compete against other teams in head-to-head highlights? Highlights are the randomly determined matchups over which players compete. The more highlights a team wins, the more it improves and the more fans it accumulates._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The season culminates with the Blood Bowl tournament. After the Blood Bowl, the season ends. Players then tally up their total fans and the manager with the most fans wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Complete, very good condition. Shipping is $10. Combined shipping rates are available when purchasing multiple items.
FOR USER Nooma ONLY!!!

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG GW03) The stadium is packed with thousands of screaming fans, gathered from across the world and eager to see the bone-crushing action of today_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s game. As the players take the field, a surge of excitement rushes from the bleachers; both teams boast impressive rosters full of players hand picked for their unique skills. Some offer speed, others size. Some will mercilessly injure their opponents, while others deviously cheat to score touchdowns. Are you ready to face off against stout Dwarfs, crafty Skaven, and ruthless Orcs, all to become Spike! Magazine’s Manager of the Year? Blood Bowl: Team Manager - The Card Game is a bone-breaking, breathtaking card game of violence and outright cheating for two to four players. Chaos, Dwarf, Wood Elf, Human, Orc, and Skaven teams compete against each other over the course of a brutal season. Customize your team by drafting Star Players, hiring staff, upgrading facilities, and cheating like mad. Lead your gang of misfits and miscreants to glory over your rivals as you strive to become Spike! Magazine’s Manager of the Year! The season is starting. What kind of team will you build?
New - In shrink wrap All profit to UK Charity Green Corridor RRP: £27.99 Green Corridor Price: £23.00

We only sell brand new, unopened games - so this game will be delivered to you directly from our warehouse as if you had ordered directly from our online store.
Postal Charges are determined by the weight of the item(s) so if you want to buy more than one game we will work out the postal charges based on the combined weight (which could add to your savings).
Post within the UK:
_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3-7 Day Delivery = £4.75 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2-3 Day Delivery = £7.40
We also offer a Collect+ Service (for £3.99 for order up to 10kg - typically 3 or 4 games!!) to most areas - in which we send your parcel to one of your local shops that act as a collection centre for this service. You simply have to pick up your parcel within 10 days of receiving a message telling you it awaits collection (typically within 3-5 days of dispatch). We can tell you more if you are interested.
Strategy Board _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Card Games is just one of the sections of our online shop that are designed to challenge you to ThinkSomeMore - so you can rest assured you are going to receive a quality product, carefully packaged and dispatched at a great price - from professional service.
Postal Charges to other countries within the EU will be quoted upon request. Typically, there is an additional charge of £3.00 or £4.00
